Profile.h

00001 #ifndef _LANG_PROFILE_H
00002 #define _LANG_PROFILE_H
00003 
00004 
00005 namespace lang
00006 {
00007 
00008 
00009 // profiling is platform dependent
00010 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(WIN32)
00011     typedef __int64 rdtsc_t;
00012     __declspec(naked) static __int64 rdtsc()
00013     {
00014         __asm
00015         {
00016             RDTSC
00017             ret
00018         }
00019     }
00020 #else
00021     typedef int rdtsc_t;
00022     static int rdtsc() {return 0;}
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 
00051 class Profile
00052 {
00053 public:
00054     enum
00055     {
00057         MAX_BLOCKS  = 256,
00059         MAX_NAME    = 16
00060     };
00061 
00068     Profile( int id, const char* sz )   : m_id(id) {if (!sm_names[id][0]) setName(id,sz); m_time=rdtsc();}
00069 
00073     ~Profile()                          {m_time=rdtsc()-m_time; sm_times[m_id] += m_time; sm_counts[m_id] += 1;}
00074 
00081     static void         beginFrame();
00082 
00087     static void         endFrame();
00088 
00092     static const char*  getName( int i );
00093 
00097     static float        getPercent( int i );
00098 
00102     static int          getCount( int i );
00103 
00107     static int          blocks();
00108 
00112     static void         reset();
00113 
00119     static int          id();
00120 
00121 private:
00122     int             m_id;
00123     rdtsc_t         m_time;
00124 
00125     static int      sm_id;
00126     static bool     sm_init;
00127     static rdtsc_t  sm_time;
00128     static double   sm_scale;
00129     static rdtsc_t  sm_times[MAX_BLOCKS];
00130     static int      sm_counts[MAX_BLOCKS];
00131     static char     sm_names[MAX_BLOCKS][MAX_NAME];
00132 
00133     static void     init();
00134     static int      indexToId( int i );
00135     static void     setName( int id, const char* sz );
00136 };
00137

00144 #define PROFILE(BLOCKNAME) static const int s_id_ ## BLOCKNAME = Profile::id(); Profile pr_ ## BLOCKNAME( s_id_ ## BLOCKNAME, #BLOCKNAME );
